name: 淫内感染2
summary: From #1, our doctor has collected a bunch of pets, including the hospital manager's daughter. To gain control of the hospital, he still has to deal with the assistant manager and a rival doctor. To do that, he needs to collect more pets. Strange that some of the girls actually love him.
info:
• 平台: WIN
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 发行日期: 1999-05-28
  • シナリオ: 前園 はるか
  • ブランド: Zyx
  • 原画: 武藤 慶次
  • 音楽: ミリオンバンブー
